tool_description: Calculates confidence scores for transcription results based on model outputs, audio quality, and linguistic consistency to assess transcription reliability.

model_name.description: Name of the model used for transcription

error_messages: Empty transcription: Provide a non-empty transcription_text for analysis.
Invalid model name: Provide the name of the model used for generating the transcription.
Invalid audio quality score: audio_quality_score must be between 0.0 and 1.0.
Invalid processing time: processing_time_ms must be a positive integer.
usage: Provide transcription_text and model_name as required parameters. Optionally include audio_quality_score and processing_time_ms. Returns comprehensive confidence metrics for the transcription.

linguistic_consistency.description: Score for linguistic consistency and grammar

low_confidence_words.description: List of words with low confidence scores
